lead_paragraph: Two feisty, free-spirited women are connected by a brilliant, charismatic poet who loves them both.The passion and pathos of legendary poet Dylan Thomas (Matthew Rhys) is told through the lives of two extraordinary women. Vera Phillips (Keira Kn
